title: Super Kuma-san
synopsis: A big studded bear that trudges with a drum and drum stick in his hand... This is Mr. Super Bear! While playing the drum and without any expression on his face, Mr. Bear rescued Maa-kun from a bank robber. One day, Maa-kun found "Mr. Super Bear" and a clown entertaining kids by performing for them. Who is this "Mr. Super Bear"...?
staff: [['Kaizawa, Yukio', ['Director']], ['Kurata, Ayako', ['Key Animation']], ['Akiyama, Kentarou', ['Background Art']], ['Yoshida, Daisuke', ['Character Design', ' Animation Director']]]
